Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: Wonderful little camera! It takes beautiful, clear pictures, even in low light. Also, the macro setting is wonderful. I took some test shots of tulips and they were just beautiful! Even on an overcast day!

Reviews.Title: Quick Delivery, Great Price, Great Camera!!
Reviews.Author: Golfguy "patm70"
Reviews.Content: Title says it all. Camera was delivered quickly and the price was great. This is second Kodak easy share camera that I have bought. It is so easy to use and photos are great for such an inexpensive camera!! I would buy from this seller again!!!!

Reviews.Title: Decent inexpensive camera
Reviews.Author: S. Powers
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 9 year old daughter and it seems to be a good value. Had some trouble getting it to power up at one point and found that it didn't work well on regular alkaline AA batteries and had to get Kodak's batteries.  Overall a good lower end camera.

Reviews.Title: LOVE my Kodak Easy Share!!!
Reviews.Author: Teresa Luby
Reviews.Content: I bought this cute camera to play with. Pictures of grand kids and pets....never thought it would have the ease and quality it has!!! Camera itself is amazing.....hard to mess up a picture. Software for computer is also comfortable to use. So happy with my purchase....we'll be enjoying it for a long time to come.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: J. Starkey
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my wife and we have both been very pleased with it.  The only thing we were surprised about was the limited picture capacity the camera has but we purchased a memory card and that fixed the problem.  Overall we are very happy with the picture quality and features the phone has.

Reviews.Title: Great so far!
Reviews.Author: siamesejo "Jo"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a gift for my daughter who is 12.  She loves it!  She takes pictures all the time and loads them on our home PC.  We have no complaints so far, but she's had it for less than a month.

Reviews.Title: Lens Error
Reviews.Author: Patricia A. Ollila "Patty Pizazz"
Reviews.Content: My daughter and I both have this camera, and a friend of hers has a similar Kodak digital camera.  All three of these cameras have experienced the same lens error at least twice.  The camera will not work at all. The three cameras have been sent in 6 times all together so far, and my daughter's camera is once again saying lens error.  It's RIDICULOUS!  Kodak fixed mine after the warranty was expired, saying it was a one time courtesy, but I have no faith whatsoever that the camera will keep working for very long.  Very frustrating.  I have always trusted Kodak, but would never again buy a digital camera from them after this.

Reviews.Title: Pink-a-licious
Reviews.Author: V. Sakraida
Reviews.Content: It's adorable and easy to use with all the features my daughter was hoping for! A big hit!

Reviews.Title: nice for the price!
Reviews.Author: shopper "shopper"
Reviews.Content: got it for a b.day gift for my daughter. performs good.if you are willing to spend a little more check out the canon powershot a great digital camera.

Reviews.Title: Cheap
Reviews.Author: Sarah Brill "Sarah"
Reviews.Content: For $80, I got what I paid for. I should have spent a bit more for a nicer camera. If you're buying this for a teen, it's great, for serious pictures, buy something else. It only turns on when it wants to.

Reviews.Title: present
Reviews.Author: mary
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my 14 year old daughter.  She loves this camera because it's easy to use. She enjoys the editing features and the ability to capture pictures from video.

Reviews.Title: Kodak EasyShare
Reviews.Author: Marla L. Ernest
Reviews.Content: This is a great little starter camera.  I bought it for my 16 year old daughter.  It has a lot of memory, and it is very simple to download her pictures.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Edeli Ben
Reviews.Content: This will be the best selling camera of 2008 and it's a VERY safe purchase.I'm amazed. And because I had almost no time to look through the camera manual before I started taking photos, I'll add that this camera is very user-friendly and easy to figure out right out of the box. I especially like the image stabilization and video capture features. I was also pleasantly surprised by the long battery life. I took about 700 pictures on one set of batteries. Overall, a great camera.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: T.S. "BluesBassist"
Reviews.Content: I originally bought this as it was one of the most inexpensive cameras on the market at the time.  I think it's a good deal but wasn't exactly impressed with the quality of the pictures.  They seem lighter on the display, then when downloaded onto the computer seem much darker.  It seems that a flash photo taken at 12 feet away should be a bit lighter than it was, and the colors seem a bit blotchy, but considering what I paid for it I can't complain too much.  It seems to go through batteries and a rechargeable option would be nice (Kodak sells a battery and charger for this) but AAs are easy to find and carrying spares are recommended.

Reviews.Title: great buy
Reviews.Author: Bullet "tigers2470"
Reviews.Content: Great buy, the easiest camera I've ever used.  I bought it for my mother-in-law that has a hard time with the new techno stuff.  This camera tells you what each function is used for.  I would buy it for my 5 year old.Great buy for someone young or is scared of new techno stuff.

Reviews.Title: Great for fun camera
Reviews.Author: Motor City Guy
Reviews.Content: I bought it for a gift.  It is fun and easy camera especially if you have the Kodak printer.  Image is not that great but if you want to use it as fun camera, it is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Seems like good camera, especially for the money.
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: Looks like a pretty good camera, especially for the money. Pictures and video are very good quality. Sound is very good. Will definitely need a memory card if you are doing video of any length, but with most digital camera's you do anyway so nothing specific to this camera. Eats batteries but most digital camera's do anyway so nothing specific to this camera. Would recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Worth the money.
Reviews.Author: Texas Honey "Texas Honey"
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera and a carrying case for my daughter (16 yrs old). The pics are really crisp and it snaps photos without hesitation like most cameras do now. The photos are easy to download and print off on our home dock. Good buy for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, Great price
Reviews.Author: T. Lowry
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my 9 year old daughter. Takes great pictures. The screen did get an error. I went to Kodak's website and sent the camera in. They fixed it quickly and at no charge.

Reviews.Title: OK camera for young kids
Reviews.Author: B. Gordon
Reviews.Content: This camera is old stock, two revisions behind at the same price.  Had I know this at the time I would have bought the most up to date version.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed with kit
Reviews.Author: Pegacorn "Pegacorn"
Reviews.Content: Bought at Christmas 2008 for a great price. Gave to aunt and other family member. Rip off. Didn't come with rechargeable batteries or charger! No wonder it was cheap. Make sure you check to ensure you get a charger and battery. Have to buy a case too. Very disappointing.Have to try to use it on non-rechargeable batteries for Easter tomorrow.

Reviews.Title: Batteries
Reviews.Author: Mary Edwards "lavender1"
Reviews.Content: Batteries, you will spend a fortune on them.other than that, it is fine.

Reviews.Title: Dissatisfied
Reviews.Author: Anne G. Gaddini
Reviews.Content: After 1 week of use the screen had a huge 'blot' on it, we had to send it back  BIG BUMMER.  Please just make products that work.

Reviews.Title: EasyShare C713 Review
Reviews.Author: Rafael Avila "Rafael Avila"
Reviews.Content: The camara works OK, but there are three things that could be better:1) The brightnes of the screen is not Ok, when you are outside you almost can't see the picturs taken.2) The time between shots is to long.3) There is somthing strange with the battery compartment and battery placment.

Reviews.Title: Great image quality
Reviews.Author: Adriana Badilla Mora "Adriana"
Reviews.Content: I was amazed to see such a good image quality in a camera under $100, the only drawback is that it doesnt include a rechargable battery.

Reviews.Title: Pink EasyShare Kodak camera
Reviews.Author: Mary Ann Moeller "Maryann"
Reviews.Content: Camera appeared easy to use and my 13 year old granddaughter loved it.  She used it immediately on Christmas.  Took good pictures.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use! Good pictures!
Reviews.Author: Natalie S "ns65"
Reviews.Content: This camera was gifted to me over the holidays.  I was able to set it up and begin using it with minimal reading of the handbook.  The camera takes great pictures; my only dislike is the delay time between pushing the 'take' button and the picture actually 'taking'. That said, I would recommend this camera to anyone wanting something inexpensive to take on vacation.  I put two new batteries in it before my vacation this past weekend and they are still good; camera doesn't seem to drain the batteries as much as the older model I had.The digital card is easy downloadable to my computer and I like that as well.Not a bad camera for the price and definately easy to use.***Natalie S.***

Reviews.Title: Great for a teenager
Reviews.Author: T. Lynch
Reviews.Content: Got this for my teenage daughter for Christmas. She loves it. The batteries drain very fast though and some of her pictures seemed to be grainy.For a first camera, we can't complain. She is very happy with it.The pink color is very pretty and fashionable.

Reviews.Title: My First Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Cathie Beck
Reviews.Content: This is a really easy digital camera to use. I'm techno challenged and I'm already sending photos in emails to share with family and friends that live a long distance away. My sister is thrilled she gets pictures from me. Ifound the maual wanting, but the camera is so easy it hasn't affected my use of it. Great price too!

Reviews.Title: Great quality and ease of use
Reviews.Author: V. Melendez
Reviews.Content: I purchased this item for my 7 year old daughter because of a Kodak that I own and love.  She has used it right out of the box with ease.  She couldn't stop taking pictures and learned how to use the review and lens quickly.  It is truly point and shoot and the price is great.  Also we got the color pink and it looks great.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Cindy Freeland "Kissimmee Pirate"
Reviews.Content: The website was awesome excellent service! Got here before the allotted time! Would definatly shop with them again! Keep up the good work!

Reviews.Title: christmas present
Reviews.Author: Tammi L. Desantis
Reviews.Content: I baught this for a christmas present. haven't used..  came in on time and looks brand new..  thanks!!

Reviews.Title: good pictures, frustrating to operate
Reviews.Author: Jill
Reviews.Content: i bought this camera for my daughter for her birthday. i stayed with kodak because i have the photo printer.  like other kodaks ive owned in the past there are issues with being able to power it on.  sometimes it works and sometimes it doesnt.  its decent when it works but so frustrating when it doesnt.  we're constantly reinserting brand new batteries.  time for me to give up on kodak and get a new printer.

Reviews.Title: Great gift...
Reviews.Author: W. C. Smith "Wenders"
Reviews.Content: Got this for my 14 year old step-daughter who has an inteest in photagraphy. This is a decent realtively inexpensive camera. Has great features for the price. I comparison shopped at several stores and no on came close to the price I paid on Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Easy to Use Camera
Reviews.Author: Randall G. Bennett
Reviews.Content: This camera is perfect for someone needing a simply, easy, point and shoot format.  Bought a 4GB SD card for it so it can store pretty much anything.

Reviews.Title: excellent camera
Reviews.Author: L. Mortensen
Reviews.Content: Easy to use--convienient and cute!  It's perfect for catching all the moments I don't want to forget

Reviews.Title: Dead new batteries
Reviews.Author: Mama Williams
Reviews.Content: The batteries came with the camera were dead, which made me think the product was bad to start off.  Fortunately my husband put his batteries in the pink camera for me, then it begins to function.  I suggest Amazon not to send the batteries along even though it probably comes with the camera.  It would mislead consumers to think otherwise, maybe they even would try to return the merchandise due to the faulty batteries.  The camera is a simple, easy point and shoot device, light weight.  It is noticeable, could not be misplaced, because it is uniquely "pink" so you don't have to look for it very hard, or mix it up with your friends'.

Reviews.Title: Pretty in pink, but not such a great buy (Bad S/W)
Reviews.Author: Mac_Cat "MacIntosh Man"
Reviews.Content: Kodak makes a pretty good camera, but it's priced at least $100 more than an equally capable Sony or Canon, with the same or better features, although only Canon has one in pink.My real problem isn't with the camera, it's with their software.  On a PC running Windows, the Kodak software is highly intrusive and it eventually clogs up the the computer with background routines that don't need to be running all the time.  And, their software is particularly difficult to remove (similar to Norton Utilities).The camera is well built, but should have a viewing lens for outdoor use,as the display screen is hard to see outside in the glare and it sucks down the battery life very fast.If you choose to buy it, I strongly recommend not installing their software on your computer.

Reviews.Title: Delicate
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Engel "Eli"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera in blue at Walmart, because it was cheap and I needed something  right away. It worked fine, but I dropped it once (in the case mind you) and the viewing screen looked shattered. Fine for taking snapshots, but maybe not for those rough and tumble folks on the go, or clumsy people like me.

Reviews.Title: kodak blues
Reviews.Author: tara greenway "taragreenway"
Reviews.Content: I had this camera less than 4wks. I went take pics on xmas would not turn on. I am having to return it. I also realized Alocal stores do not eeven carry the 7 g camera any more. all 8G. Payed to much for an outdated camera that left me pictureless

Reviews.Title: Satisfaction Guaranteed
Reviews.Author: Max R. Marcano Campos "Easyshare"
Reviews.Content: I received a brand new, better priced product, excellent conditions and it matched my expectations. From now on I will rely on Amazon offers, thanks to its quick dispatch and first quality products.

Reviews.Title: Works great for a couple of month/ then freezes up on you/don't purchase this camera you will be sorry
Reviews.Author: lot4my$
Reviews.Content: Kodak does not stand behind their products.  Sent in to be repaired twice, still having the same problem but is now 1 month over the warranty date.  Kodak supervisor said it is our problem not his.  Go ahead and purchase if you want that kind of customer service, because I guarantee you will be dealing with them if you purchase this camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
7-megapixel resolution; 3x optical zoom
2.4-inch LCD screen displays your photos before you take them
Shoot VGA video and also record audio
Digital Image Stabilization
Compatible with SD/MMC cards to easily store and transfer your favorite shots
ProductInfo.Name: Kodak EasyShare C713 7MP Digital Camera (Pink)
